descriptionlist.description:
VolFlash lets you choose how to easily toggle your flashlight with the hardware buttons, currently there are 6 gestures available:
1. Volume up then volume down (and vice versa)
2. Volume up and down
3. Hold the power button
4. Double press the power button
5. Triple press the power button
6. Triple press the home button

You can suggest new gestures by sending me a message on reddit (u/Cemre2017) or on twitter (@Cemre_Suler)

Thanks to u/chilaxan for assisting me with creating this tweak!
